scripts.start: npm run build:happ && npm run start:host
scripts.start:info: npm run build:happ && RUST_LOG=host=info npm run start:host
scripts.start:debug: npm run build:happ && RUST_LOG=host=debug npm run start:host
scripts.build: npm run build:happ && npm run build:host
scripts.check: cargo check --manifest-path happ/Cargo.toml --workspace --target wasm32-unknown-unknown && cargo check --manifest-path host/Cargo.toml --workspace
scripts.sweetest: RUST_LOG=${RUST_LOG:-warn} WASM_LOG=${WASM_LOG:-warn} npm run build:happ && npm run sweet:test
scripts.clean: npm run clean:rust && npm run clean:ui
scripts.clean:rust: npx rimraf 'target' '.cargo' 'Cargo.lock' 'flake.lock' && npm run clean:rust -w happ && npm run clean:rust -w host
scripts.clean:ui: npx rimraf 'package-lock.json' 'node_modules' && npm run clean:ui -w host && npm run clean:ui -w happ
